abstract: Rio Tinto said Tuesday has completed the almost $2 billion sale of some divisions of its Alcan business to Amcor, taking another step toward cutting its debt load.
snippet: Rio Tinto said Tuesday has completed the almost $2 billion sale of some divisions of its Alcan business to Amcor, taking another step toward cutting its debt load.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto said Tuesday it had completed the almost $2 billion sale of some divisions of its Alcan business to Amcor, taking another step toward cutting its debt load.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Sells Alcan Units to Amcor for $1.95 Billion
